channel.title: Oscar Yinn on codex
channel.description: Recent content in Oscar Yinn on codex

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Junjie Oscar Yin I am excessively interested in building efficient and trustworthy systems that possess a deeper understanding of language and vision. More broadly, I am drawn by research that makes progress toward the intersection of language and vision through deep learning. In my undergraduate years at Johns Hopkins and Oxford, I am forunate to be advised by Alan Yuille and Volodymy Kuleshov. Recent Updates Below you will find the most recent updates since my PhD application:
